title:
Generalized dessin partition function, cut-and-join type representation,
  and polynomiality
abstract:
In this paper we study the enumeration problem of a special kind of branched
coverings of the Riemann sphere, whose partition function can be regarded as a
generalization of the dessin partition function. First we derive a cut-and-join
type representation for the generalized dessin partition function using the
actions of $W$-type operators on Schur functions. Then we study the polynomial
structures of the generalized dessin partition function. We prove a polynomial
structure for the disconnected correlators which generalizes a result of
Stanley, and then propose a conjectural polynomial structure for the connected
correlators. We prove the $1$-point case of this conjecture using the KP
integrability of this partition function.
subjects: Nonlinear Sciences/Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
